entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kindersley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -27.6°C

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023
